sentences.english: He always cheats others, thus none of us trust him.
sentences.chinese: 他经常唬人，因此大家都不信任他。

sentences.english: And the imperialist always also likes to come formidably with his of gally person.
sentences.chinese: 而帝国主义者也总是喜欢以自己的强大来吓唬人的。

sentences.english: You can always go trick-or-treating during the afternoon or to the mall.
sentences.chinese: 你可以一直在下午或商业街上耍那唬人的把戏。

sentences.english: We don't want to alarm people but we want them to be prepared.
sentences.chinese: 我们并不想吓唬人，但是我们希望人们做好准备。

sentences.english: This idiom means relying on another 's power to bully or frighten others.
sentences.chinese: 这个成语用来比喻依仗别人的势力去欺压人或吓唬人。

sentences.english: They go to people's house. And they scare the people.
sentences.chinese: 他们到人们的家里，然后吓唬人。

sentences.english: Stop pretending to be a ghost, you frighten no one.
sentences.chinese: 冒充鬼物吓唬人了，没人怕你。

sentences.english: Were all those pandemic warnings just scare-mongering?
sentences.chinese: 那些流行病预警是杞人忧天吓唬人的吗？

sentences.english: But creating something useful is the bugaboo.
sentences.chinese: 但是，创造出有用的东西听来有点唬人。

sentences.english: He blustered like a villain in a comedy.
sentences.chinese: 他像喜剧中的坏人那样吓唬人。

sentences.english: I thought the veiled threat of war was bluff .
sentences.chinese: 我认为那含蓄的战争恫吓是吓唬人的。

sentences.english: The media does as much spinning as the politicians.
sentences.chinese: 媒体和政治家一样都是唬人的。

definition: deliberately mystifying/to make sth unnecessarily complicated
looks impressive but is worthless (idiom)/not as good as it looks/a reputation with no substance
lit. to wave a banner as if it were a tiger skin (idiom)/fig. to borrow sb's prestige/to take the name of a great cause as a shield
pinyin: la1 da4 qi2 zuo4 hu3 pi2

definition: lit. dress up as God, play the devil (idiom); fig. to mystify/to deceive people/to scam
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
see 裝點門面|装点门面[zhuang1 dian3 men2 mian4]
flowery of fist with fancy footwork (idiom)/highly embellished and ineffectual/fancy but impractical skills/all show and no go/pugilistic wankery
